abstracts.cdata!:
This report is a summary of the
            environmental impact assessment of the Strategic Urban Roads
            Infrastructure Project (SURIP).  The purpose of the previous
            impact assessments of the five initial SURIP projects were
            to identify potential project impacts as well as measures to
            minimize, manage and monitor adverse impacts.  Based on
            these impact studies, this environmental assessment has been
            prepared to comply with project appraisal requirements of
            the World Bank and is organized into the following seven
            chapters: 1) project description; 2) environmental and
            social impact assessment framework; 3) existing
            environmental and social conditions; 4) significant
            environmental impacts; 5) analysis of alternatives; 6)
            environmental impact management and monitoring; and 7)
            social impact management and monitoring.
